channel.title: Gaussian Processes on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Gaussian Processes on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Computation-Aware Gaussian Processes: Model Selection And Linear-Time Inference
item.description: Computation-Aware Gaussian Processes (CaGP) achieve linear-time inference and model selection, enabling efficient training of GPs on large datasets without compromising uncertainty quantification, sur…

item.title: Improving Linear System Solvers for Hyperparameter Optimisation in Iterative Gaussian Processes
item.description: Accelerate Gaussian process hyperparameter optimization by up to 72x using novel linear system solver techniques.
